{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3487231,"name":"Carsten Lucas Kinderknecht","username":"clkinder1","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/bc8723/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-19T03:06:42.181Z","cooked":"

Hey all,

I’m very intrigued with the new Minion motor from CTR, and I was just reaching out to see if anybody knew if it could be used with the sport 57 gearbox from Andymark given a kraken pinion and the 550 mounting hardware?

Thank you in advance.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-01-19T03:06:42.181Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":70,"reads":225,"readers_count":224,"score":395.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":482611,"topic_slug":"ctr-minion-with-andy-mark-sport-gearbox","display_username":"Carsten Lucas Kinderknecht","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":46126,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/ctr-minion-with-andy-mark-sport-gearbox/482611/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true,"can_vote":false},{"id":3487372,"name":"NathanNFM","username":"NathanNFM","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nathannfm/{size}/181060_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-19T08:46:25.361Z","cooked":"

The output shaft it too long for this to work, and the 550/775 backplate is not compatible with the nose boss on the motor. You could probably 3D print a custom back plate to make this work, but don’t count on an official one being available this season.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2025-01-19T08:46:25.361Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":194,"readers_count":193,"score":58.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":482611,"topic_slug":"ctr-minion-with-andy-mark-sport-gearbox","display_username":"NathanNFM","primary_group_name":"AndyMark","flair_name":"AndyMark","flair_url":"/uploads/default/original/3X/7/2/72db24f824a25ae17c6413b3d02a345e47f060a9.png","flair_bg_color":"","flair_color":"","flair_group_id":59,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":14566,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"AndyMark Senior Mechanical Engineer"},"post_url":"/t/ctr-minion-with-andy-mark-sport-gearbox/482611/2","custom_user_title":"AndyMark Senior Mechanical Engineer","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3487412,"name":"billbo911","username":"billbo911","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/billbo911/{size}/110890_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-19T13:22:39.263Z","cooked":"

The adapter would end up looking like this. This is a prototype, the actual dimentions are slightly different.

25d40c3b-de09-4883-9c94-7aa2f95cf0551920×3410 203 KB

0f925e53-4746-4082-bf49-baba6d083f371920×3410 211 KB

We are still waiting for our Minions to arrive.

Thank you both for your quick responses. I’ll have to draft up the plate in SolidWorks.

Lets just hope the torque doesnt tear up the plastic.

This is now officially available.

AndyMark 2024 - 2025 Product Releases & Updates General Forum
Our big new product this week is the Minion Sport Motor Mount Kit! [image] [image] Thanks to BaneBots for getting the block made in record time! These are in stock and shipping now! Also, we now have a 3/8" Hex Sport output shaft and a some Robits oriented mounting brackets that, like always, are on a standard 1/2" grid of #‌10 holes [image][image] Both the Minion input option and the 3/8 Hex shaft option will be available as configuration options on the main Sport Gearbox page later thi…
